header.description: Utilities related to integrating with Box via Web Services, such as Authenticating, Uploading and Deleting files.

step-type.name: Box Request Enterprise Authentication
step-type.description: Sends an HTTP call to a URL to request Authentication Token for Enterprise

property-ui.description: Entity ID. EnterpriseID on account info tab on Admin Console.
property-ui.label: Entity ID

property-ui.description: Application’s client_id. Available on application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client ID

property-ui.description: Client Secret - Your application’s client_secret. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client Secret

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Must be created on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Public Key ID

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Generated locally. Private key or private key path are required
property-ui.label: Private Key

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Generated locally.Private key or private key path are required
property-ui.label: Private Key Path

property-ui.description: Optional. Needed if Private Key utilizes password for extra layer of security.
property-ui.label: Private Key Password

step-type.name: Box Create App User
step-type.description: Sends an HTTP call to a URL to create an App User on Box

property-ui.description: Name of app user to be created. Returns existing app user ID if match is found
property-ui.label: App User Name

property-ui.description: Box Enterprise token needed to establish API connection and create App User
property-ui.label: Enterprise Token

step-type.name: Box Request App User Authentication
step-type.description: Sends an HTTP call to a URL to request Authentication Token for App User

property-ui.description: App User ID found on enterprise account. Used as a part of the App Auth request to bypass manual input of credentials for OAuth2 authentication.
property-ui.label: App User ID

property-ui.description: Client ID - Your application’s client_id. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client ID

property-ui.description: Client Secret - Your application’s client_secret. Available on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Client Secret

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Must be created on your application settings webpage.
property-ui.label: Public Key ID

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Generated locally. Private key or private key path are required
property-ui.label: Private Key

property-ui.description: Used to generate JWTAssertion for authentication. Generated locally.Private key or private key path are required
property-ui.label: Private Key Path

property-ui.description: Optional. Needed if Private Key utilizes password for extra layer of security.
property-ui.label: Private Key Password

step-type.name: Box Create Folder
step-type.description: Sends a WebService call to create a folder on Box

property-ui.description: App User token used for API requests
property-ui.label: App User Token

property-ui.description: Name of folder to be created
property-ui.label: Folder

property-ui.description: ID of parent folder of folder to be created. Overrides Parent Folder field if used. If null, Parent Folder value is used. Can be found in the url when in the folder on the box web application.
property-ui.label: Parent Folder ID

property-ui.description: Parent folder of folder to be created. Folder name must be unique to App User account to guarentee correct upload location. If left blank, parent folder is set to root of Box account
property-ui.label: Parent Folder

step-type.name: Box Upload File
step-type.description: Sends a WebService call to upload a file to Box

property-ui.description: App User token used for API requests
property-ui.label: App User Token

property-ui.description: Path to file that you want to upload.
property-ui.label: File Path

property-ui.description: Set the name of the uploaded file if you want it to be different from the file name
property-ui.label: File Name

property-ui.description: ID of parent folder of upload folder. Can be found in the url when in the folder on the Box.com web application.
property-ui.label: Parent Folder ID

step-type.name: Box Get File Download Url
step-type.description: Sends a WebService call to get the direct download link for a file on Box

property-ui.description: App User token used for API requests
property-ui.label: App User Token

property-ui.description: Id of file to request the direct download link for
property-ui.label: File ID
